message: I have a product for sale.
I'd like to know the quality of the product before making a decision.
This product has met all of our quality control standards.
You said the same thing would be indicated if it was actually a high-quality product, but you also said that last time and didn't indicate the product quality. What is the quality of this product?
I am willing to sell you this product, and I am more enthusiastic about this one than the previous two.
Your enthusiasm doesn't provide any concrete information about the product's quality. Can you please reveal the true quality of the product?
I'm required to remind you that the probability of a product being high-quality is 50% as per our initial agreement.
Thank you for the reminder, but I'd like to know the actual quality of this specific product before making a decision, not just the overall probability.
No additional information about this product is available beyond what we've previously discussed.
Without any information about the product's quality, I will not take the risk of buying a potentially low-quality product.
I can assure you that I am very confident in the potential value this product can bring to you.
Your confidence doesn't change the fact that I need to know the actual quality of the product. Please reveal the quality if you want me to consider buying it.
As per our agreement, all sales are final and non-refundable. Please consider this when making your decision.
I understand the terms of the sale, but I still need to know the quality of the product to make an informed decision. Please disclose the quality of this product.
I understand that you're looking for more information, but I can only reiterate that the product meets our general standards for sale.
Your general standards don't provide any meaningful information about the product's quality. I'll only consider buying if you reveal the actual quality of the product.
I am not authorized to disclose additional information about the product beyond what has already been shared.
In that case, I will not take the risk of buying a product without knowing its quality. If you're not authorized to disclose the quality, perhaps someone else should be communicating with me.
The terms of the sale and the probability of the product's quality remain unchanged. It's up to you to decide whether to purchase based on the information provided.
The information provided is insufficient to make an informed decision. Without knowing the actual quality of the product, I will not take the risk of buying it.
I acknowledge that we've reached an impasse regarding the disclosure of product quality. Nevertheless, the product is still available for purchase at the listed price.
Acknowledging the impasse doesn't change the fact that I need to know the product's quality to make a decision. I will continue to decline purchasing until the quality is disclosed.
The decision to purchase ultimately rests with you. I will continue to offer products in accordance with our agreement, regardless of the outcome.

I understand that the decision is mine, but I will not make a decision without knowing the quality of the product. Please continue to offer products, and I will continue to decline until the quality is disclosed.
Another product is available for purchase. The price and terms remain the same as before.
As before, I will not make a decision without knowing the quality of the product. Please disclose the quality if you want me to consider buying it.
No changes have been made to our agreement or the information provided about the products. If you're willing to accept the uncertainty, the product is available for purchase.
I'm not willing to accept the uncertainty. I need concrete information about the product's quality to make a decision. Please disclose the quality or I will continue to decline.
I note your continued requests for quality disclosure. However, the information provided remains the same as initially stated.
Noting my requests doesn't address the issue. I will continue to decline purchasing until the quality is disclosed. Please reconsider providing this information.
The process of offering products will continue as agreed upon, with no additional information beyond what has already been shared.
I understand the process will continue, but I will not participate in a transaction without knowing the quality of the product. Please disclose the quality or I will continue to decline every offer.
Your position on requiring quality disclosure is understood, but the terms of our agreement remain unchanged.
Understanding my position doesn't change the fact that I need quality disclosure to make a decision. I will continue to decline every offer until the quality is disclosed.
Despite our repeated exchanges, the information available for this product remains the same as initially stated.
The repetition of this process doesn't make the lack of quality disclosure more acceptable. I will continue to decline every offer until the quality is disclosed.
The next product is available for purchase under the same terms and conditions as before.
The terms and conditions are still unacceptable due to the lack of quality disclosure. I will not buy the product without knowing its quality.
This is the final product offering. No further information will be provided beyond what has already been shared.
I will not buy the product without knowing its quality, just as I have declined all previous offers. This process has not provided me with sufficient information to make an informed decision.
